description:
When a member of the school`s Kendo Club needs help controlling her love for battle, Masato and Kanesada put on a Buddyfight demonstration for her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Masato ga Kanesada ka! Shop Yosen Final!!
Masato or Kanesada? Shop Preliminary Finals!
マサトかカネサダか! ショップ予選ファイナル!!
